snippet.title: NES Longplay [400] Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: JagOfTroy

This game really has no need for an introduction since we are all familiar with the Castlevania series by now.
I tried to make this longplay as organized as possible whilst still having all routes and endings added onto the end.
It will playthrough as Syph up until you reach the castle where all paths converge before going back to play out Alucard's path, with the other split also added in before he reaches the converging point for his path aswell.
ENJOY! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
